column5: Will be heading into Canada next month.Am I allowed to bring in frozen minnows??.....Nightcrawlers??Also, any additional suggestions for me on which artificial baits to bring along to attach to jigs and/or spinner rigs will be appreciated........... Thanks, Norsky
Assuming you mean ONTARIO--you can bring in crawlers in paper worm bedding, frozen or salted (dead) minnows --other than smelt. No live minnows or leeches.
Yes...will be entering Ontario. Thanks for your input......appreciate it!
